-1.title: Episode dated 2 November 2010
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Peter's Backyard
1.plot: The backyard can be a great place for an exciting safari with amazing, weird, and cute creatures that live just beyond your doorstep.

2.title: The Season of Autumn
2.plot: The season of Autumn slowly transforms the natural world, which triggers all wildlife to go through amazing changes in preparation for Winter.

3.title: Critters at the Capital
3.plot: Even in a big, bustling city like Washington D.C., there are different types of animals that have made their homes - right next door to humans.

imdb.plot outline: Unlike many other wildlife programs, "Critter Quest!" explores accessible habitats like backyards, rivers, fields, and forests, in order to discover all the amazing wildlife that lives all around us. America's hands-on naturalist, Peter Schriemer, has an infectious enthusiasm for wildlife, and for teaching children to safely discover the natural world around them. "Critter Quest!" shows how often familiar places, can turn out to be amazing habitats with incredible wildlife. You just have to take...a closer look.
imdb.title: Critter Quest!
plot: In this activity based children's nature show, naturalist Peter Schriemer goes in search of amazing critters in different habitats across America.::Anonymous

Unlike many other wildlife programs, "_Critter Quest!_ (qv)" explores accessible habitats like backyards, rivers, fields, and forests, in order to discover all the amazing wildlife that lives all around us. America's hands-on naturalist, Peter Schriemer, has an infectious enthusiasm for wildlife, and for teaching children to safely discover the natural world around them. "_Critter Quest!_ (qv)" shows how often familiar places, can turn out to be amazing habitats with incredible wildlife. You just have to take...a closer look.::Anonymous
